description_en: The React Framework for the Web
submitRequirements_zh: 需要提供详细的bug报告或功能请求，遵循贡献指南
submitRequirements_en: Detailed bug reports or feature requests required, following contribution guidelines
rating_zh: 优秀的React框架，提供了包括SSR、SSG、API路由等在内的完整全栈解决方案。文档完善，社区活跃，是现代Web开发的首选框架之一。
rating_en: Excellent React framework providing a complete full-stack solution including SSR, SSG, API routes, and more. Comprehensive documentation, active community, one of the preferred frameworks for modern web development.
